document_data.name: Omskilar Rethwood
document_data.mainbody: '''Omskilar Rethwood''' was an outlaw as well as a member of the [[Company of the Cloak]].
document_data.Activities: He loved to kill, often slaying specific individuals with a single [[crossbow]] [[bolt]]. Failing this, Omskilar would attach a scroll with a message to a bolt's shaft in order to intimidate targets.
document_data.Abilities: Along with all of the other members of the Company of the Cloak, Omskilar possessed an immunity to [[oil of taggit]] (which caused unconsciousness).
